entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is introduced as a werewolf who has just arrived at Shell Cottage with news of his wife's childbirth. He is described as being white-faced and wrapped in a traveling cloak.

entities.name: nymphadora tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned by Lupin as his wife who has just given birth to their child.

entities.name: ted
entities.description: Ted is the newborn baby boy of Lupin and Tonks. He is named after Dora's father.

entities.name: dora
entities.description: Dora is mentioned as the father of Ted, implying that she is a person who has a relationship with someone else.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the people present at Shell Cottage and reacts with excitement to the news of Tonks' childbirth.

relationships.description: Lupin is married to Nymphadora Tonks, as mentioned in the dialogue.
Lupin is the parent of Ted, as he has just announced his birth and named him after Dora's father.
